original_text: ‘I will also punish the people who rush into other people's houses. They do that because they want to rob those people.
korean_text: 그 날에 문턱을 뛰어넘어서 포악과 거짓을 자기 주인의 집에 채운 자들을 내가 벌하리라

sentences.original_text: I will also punish the people
who rush into other people's houses
They do that because they want to rob those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 사람들을 훔치고 싶어서 그렇게 한다
